mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_doc(
enfdocid,
docid,
enfgubun,
relaydocid,
receiverid,
recvdeptid,
doctitle,
keyword,
docstatus,
apprdocnum,
acceptdocseq,
acceptdt,
acceptid,
acceptname,
acceptdutyname,
acceptgradeid,
acceptpositionid,
acceptdeptid,
acceptdeptname,
acceptdeptnamedesc,
actseq,
open,
openbasis,
openreason,
readrangetype,
recvdt,
distributeflag,
setcardflag,
shareopnflag,
moveflag,
paperdocflag,
paperbodyflag,
attcount,
delflag,
relaytype,
systemtype,
convbodyflag,
drmgubun,
firstreadid,
firstreaddt,
inid,
indt,
upid,
updt,
distributedocseq,
distributeorgid,
paperappid,
paperappname,
paperappdeptname,
paperappdutyname,
readlimittype,
readlimitdate,
protectflag,
chargerid,
chargerdeptid,
distributedt,
paperrecgubun,
paperrecspecial,
paperrectypes,
apprdocnumcode,
transflag,
recordersummary,
emergency,
addsendcnt,
docgroup,
faketitle,
) VALUES(
#{enfdocid},
#{docid},
#{enfgubun},
#{relaydocid},
#{receiverid},
#{recvdeptid},
#{doctitle},
#{keyword},
#{docstatus},
#{apprdocnum},
#{acceptdocseq},
#{acceptdt},
#{acceptid},
#{acceptname},
#{acceptdutyname},
#{acceptgradeid},
#{acceptpositionid},
#{acceptdeptid},
#{acceptdeptname},
#{acceptdeptnamedesc},
#{actseq},
#{open},
#{openbasis},
#{openreason},
#{readrangetype},
#{recvdt},
#{distributeflag},
#{setcardflag},
#{shareopnflag},
#{moveflag},
#{paperdocflag},
#{paperbodyflag},
#{attcount},
#{delflag},
#{relaytype},
#{systemtype},
#{convbodyflag},
#{drmgubun},
#{firstreadid},
#{firstreaddt},
#{inid},
#{indt},
#{upid},
#{updt},
#{distributedocseq},
#{distributeorgid},
#{paperappid},
#{paperappname},
#{paperappdeptname},
#{paperappdutyname},
#{readlimittype},
#{readlimitdate},
#{protectflag},
#{chargerid},
#{chargerdeptid},
#{distributedt},
#{paperrecgubun},
#{paperrecspecial},
#{paperrectypes},
#{apprdocnumcode},
#{transflag},
#{recordersummary},
#{emergency},
#{addsendcnt},
#{docgroup},
#{faketitle},
) ON CONFLICT (enfdocid ) DO UPDATE SET docstatus = #{docstatus}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (A.updt, A.docid) A.enfdocid as "enfdocid" , A.docid as "docid" , A.enfgubun as "enfgubun" , A.relaydocid as "relaydocid" , A.receiverid as "receiverid" , A.recvdeptid as "recvdeptid" , A.doctitle as "doctitle" , A.keyword as "keyword" , A.docstatus as "docstatus" , A.apprdocnum as "apprdocnum" , A.acceptdocseq as "acceptdocseq" , A.acceptdt as "acceptdt" , A.acceptid as "acceptid" , A.acceptname as "acceptname" , A.acceptdutyname as "acceptdutyname" , A.acceptgradeid as "acceptgradeid" , A.acceptpositionid as "acceptpositionid" , A.acceptdeptid as "acceptdeptid" , A.acceptdeptname as "acceptdeptname" , A.acceptdeptnamedesc as "acceptdeptnamedesc" , A.actseq as "actseq" , A.open as "open" , A.openbasis as "openbasis" , A.openreason as "openreason" , A.readrangetype as "readrangetype" , A.recvdt as "recvdt" , A.distributeflag as "distributeflag" , A.setcardflag as "setcardflag" , A.shareopnflag as "shareopnflag" , A.moveflag as "moveflag" , A.paperdocflag as "paperdocflag" , A.paperbodyflag as "paperbodyflag" , A.attcount as "attcount" , A.delflag as "delflag" , A.relaytype as "relaytype" , A.systemtype as "systemtype" , A.convbodyflag as "convbodyflag" , A.drmgubun as "drmgubun" , A.firstreadid as "firstreadid" , A.firstreaddt as "firstreaddt" , A.inid as "inid" , A.indt as "indt" , A.upid as "upid" , A.updt as "updt" , A.distributedocseq as "distributedocseq" , A.distributeorgid as "distributeorgid" , A.paperappid as "paperappid" , A.paperappname as "paperappname" , A.paperappdeptname as "paperappdeptname" , A.paperappdutyname as "paperappdutyname" , A.readlimittype as "readlimittype" , A.readlimitdate as "readlimitdate" , A.protectflag as "protectflag" , A.chargerid as "chargerid" , A.chargerdeptid as "chargerdeptid" , A.distributedt as "distributedt" , A.paperrecgubun as "paperrecgubun" , A.paperrecspecial as "paperrecspecial" , A.paperrectypes as "paperrectypes" , A.apprdocnumcode as "apprdocnumcode" , A.transflag as "transflag" , A.recordersummary as "recordersummary" , A.emergency as "emergency" , A.addsendcnt as "addsendcnt" , A.docgroup as "docgroup" , A.faketitle as "faketitle" , B.secgubun as "secgubun" , B.seclevel as "seclevel" , B.orgnprotdt as "orgnprotdt" , B.orgnnextlevel as "orgnnextlevel" , B.orgnreclass as "orgnreclass" , B.orgnprotcond as "orgnprotcond" , B.copyprotdt as "copyprotdt" , B.copynextlevel as "copynextlevel" , B.copyreclass as "copyreclass" , B.copyprotcond as "copyprotcond" , B.prsrvterm as "prsrvterm" , B.docno as "docno" , B.mgmtno as "mgmtno" , B.copyno as "copyno" , B.createdeptid as "createdeptid" , B.createdeptname as "createdeptname" , B.docpagenum as "docpagenum" , B.specialyn as "specialyn" , B.binderyn as "binderyn" , B.secretdocyn as "secretdocyn" , B.waryn as "waryn" , B.isnewrule as "isnewrule" , B.istransrule as "istransrule" , B.orgncreateyear as "orgncreateyear" , B.wargubun as "wargubun" , C.docttl as "docttl" , C.gubun as "gubun" , C.authorid as "authorid" , C.authorname as "authorname" , C.authordutyname as "authordutyname" , C.authorpositionid as "authorpositionid" , C.authorgradeid as "authorgradeid" , C.authordeptid as "authordeptid" , C.authordeptname as "authordeptname" , C.authordeptnamedesc as "authordeptnamedesc" , C.lastauthorid as "lastauthorid" , C.lastauthorname as "lastauthorname" , C.state as "state" , C.docnoseq as "docnoseq" , C.tempflag as "tempflag" , C.reportdt as "reportdt" , C.enddt as "enddt" , C.docfrom as "docfrom" , C.rcvsflag as "rcvsflag" , C.typeflag as "typeflag" , C.setupflag as "setupflag" , C.oridocid as "oridocid" , C.oriseq as "oriseq" , C.batchseq as "batchseq" , C.paperflag as "paperflag" , C.maindocflag as "maindocflag" , C.attachseq as "attachseq" , C.migflag as "migflag" , C.addsendstate as "addsendstate" , C.papersendflag as "papersendflag" , C.filelendflag as "filelendflag" , D.deptname as "deptname" , E.* , G.actgubun , G.actopinion FROM sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_doc A LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_attr B ON ( A.docid = B.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_rdoc C ON ( A.docid = C.docid ) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_appr_recv D ON (A.docid = D.docid) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_doc_sendinfo E ON (A.docid = E.docid) LEFT OUTER JOIN sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_history G ON (A.enfdocid = G.enfdocid) WHERE 1 = 1 and A.inid = #{userid} and A.docstatus = 'EDS02'
and A.docid = #{docid}
and A.docstatus like CONCAT('%', #{docstatus}, '%')
and recvdt like CONCAT('%', #{recvdt}, '%')
and docno like CONCAT('%', #{docno}, '%')
and seclevel = #{seclevel}
and A.doctitle like CONCAT('%', #{doctitle}, '%')
and D.deptname like CONCAT('%', #{deptname}, '%')
and createdeptname like CONCAT('%', #{createdeptname}, '%')
and enfgubun like CONCAT('%', #{enfgubun}, '%')
and recvdt like CONCAT('%', #{startDt}, '%')
and recvdt like CONCAT('%', #{endDt}, '%')
and A.updt >= #{startDt}
and A.updt <= #{endDt}
ORDER BY A.updt DESC, A.docid DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE sbms.sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_doc
docid = #{docid},
enfgubun = #{enfgubun},
relaydocid = #{relaydocid},
receiverid = #{receiverid},
recvdeptid = #{recvdeptid},
doctitle = #{doctitle},
keyword = #{keyword},
docstatus = #{docstatus},
apprdocnum = #{apprdocnum},
acceptdocseq = #{acceptdocseq},
acceptdt = #{acceptdt},
acceptid = #{acceptid},
acceptname = #{acceptname},
acceptdutyname = #{acceptdutyname},
acceptgradeid = #{acceptgradeid},
acceptpositionid = #{acceptpositionid},
acceptdeptid = #{acceptdeptid},
acceptdeptname = #{acceptdeptname},
acceptdeptnamedesc = #{acceptdeptnamedesc},
actseq = #{actseq},
open = #{open},
openbasis = #{openbasis},
openreason = #{openreason},
readrangetype = #{readrangetype},
recvdt = #{recvdt},
distributeflag = #{distributeflag},
setcardflag = #{setcardflag},
shareopnflag = #{shareopnflag},
moveflag = #{moveflag},
paperdocflag = #{paperdocflag},
paperbodyflag = #{paperbodyflag},
attcount = #{attcount},
delflag = #{delflag},
relaytype = #{relaytype},
systemtype = #{systemtype},
convbodyflag = #{convbodyflag},
drmgubun = #{drmgubun},
firstreadid = #{firstreadid},
firstreaddt = #{firstreaddt},
inid = #{inid},
indt = #{indt},
upid = #{upid},
updt = #{updt},
distributedocseq = #{distributedocseq},
distributeorgid = #{distributeorgid},
paperappid = #{paperappid},
paperappname = #{paperappname},
paperappdeptname = #{paperappdeptname},
paperappdutyname = #{paperappdutyname},
readlimittype = #{readlimittype},
readlimitdate = #{readlimitdate},
protectflag = #{protectflag},
chargerid = #{chargerid},
chargerdeptid = #{chargerdeptid},
distributedt = #{distributedt},
paperrecgubun = #{paperrecgubun},
paperrecspecial = #{paperrecspecial},
paperrectypes = #{paperrectypes},
apprdocnumcode = #{apprdocnumcode},
transflag = #{transflag},
recordersummary = #{recordersummary},
emergency = #{emergency},
addsendcnt = #{addsendcnt},
docgroup = #{docgroup},
faketitle = #{faketitle},
WHERE 1 = 1 and enfdocid = #{enfdocid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_doc ( enfdocid, docid, enfgubun, recvdeptid, doctitle, docstatus, acceptdocseq, acceptid, acceptname, acceptdutyname, acceptdeptid, acceptdeptname, paperdocflag, inid, indt, upid, updt, chargerid, emergency ) select 'ENF' || sbms.sbms_user.sys_guid() as enfdocid, #{docid}, e.enfgubun, e.recvdeptid, e.doctitle, e.docstatus, e.acceptdocseq, e.acceptid, e.acceptname, e.acceptdutyname, e.acceptdeptid, e.acceptdeptname, e.paperdocflag, e.inid, e.indt, e.upid, e.updt, e.chargerid, e.emergency from sbms_user.bms_dct_enf_doc e where e.docid = #{oridocid}
